verbs.description: [ARG0: swat team] [V: finds] [ARG1: man dead] [ARGM-LOC: inside home] [ARGM-TMP: following standoff] police in gwinnett county said the swat team found a man who was the subject of a day - long standoff with police dead inside his norcross - area home thursday evening swat gwinnett county police gwinnett county georgia
